content.rendered:
AIM Education & Research Society is an NGO, a non-governmental organization which is being run by a Group of likeminded, highly Educated and dedicated people with a non-profit motive that works for the upliftment and rehabilitation of the underprivileged Children, Girls, Women and Youth both on the National and International level. We have a vision and are task oriented and are driven by people with a common interest, we perform a variety of services with a social objective and on humanitarian grounds. AIM Education & Research Society is registered NGO under Planning Commission – Government of India with registration no AP/2009/0010377. ISO 9001 : 2015 Certified. This is a not for profit Institution.

•WeareoneoftheMembersofGuideStarIndiawhich is India’s largest and most reliable NGO information repository.

•We are also a Member of UN Global Compact The World’s largest Corporate Sustainability Initiative, a voluntary organization based on CEO commitments to implement universal sustainability principles and take steps to support UN goals.

•We got Special Consultative Status under the Economic and Social Council (ECOSOC)UN. ECOSOC and its subsidiary bodies.The Economic and Social Council is the principal organ that coordinates the economic, social and related work of the 14 United Nations specialized agencies, functional commissions and five regional commissions.

•Coaching for qualifying examination for admission in technical / professional courses such as: NEET, EAMCET, AIEEE, IITJE, ICET, EdCET, LawCET

•Coaching for Language / aptitude examination for seeking admission to foreign Universities such as: IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, GMAT & SAT.

•Foreign Admission Counseling, Short listing of Universities.



Dr.Mohammed Masood Mohiuddin
MBA, FIE, PhD Founder Chairman / CEO AIM Education & Research Society
Prof. P. GOVINDA REDDY
PhD (I.I.T, DELHI), Ex Chairman, AICTE – SRC ADVISOR
Mohammed Shameemuddin
Addl. DCP (Retd), HYDERABAD ADVISOR
Prof..A R Aryasri
DIRECTOR (Retd). JNTU, ADVISOR
Prof. S. Satyanarayana - Advisor
Ex Vice Chancellor Osmania University Rajiv Gandhi Knowledge University
